name: The Little Man in Your Computer
name_original: The Little Man in Your Computer
description:
The little man in your computer. 
Something's gotta make it work right?
(Not enough planning and thought went into making it more than a mini game at best.)

Controls: 

Arrow keys to move the man
Space to click the virtual mouse

Esc to restart or quit

An extra interpretation of the theme "Keep it Simple" for #stopwaitingforgodot

Lore plans:

It's how a computer works, the black box and power and tah-dah. The little man is alive and making it work. 

He's 'the system' 
In charge of searching & keeping track of your files, moving your mouse, playing the role of AI during chess. He does a lot. 

Is he good or bad?
He's you! So both? He's kind of like a parasite, you're stuck with him and he's stuck with you. 


TBD: Music, options for changing sound settings
